::Zardus::

Zardus looks from Hell Beast to Megatron to the direction of the maximal 
base. His eyes narrow as he hears gunfire. He smiles. This was the perfect 
opportunity.

"I believe we can gain the maximals' trust by helping them out," he says, "It 
would be much easier to deal with them."

He looks at all the troops assembled, noting Blue Reeker's arrival.

"Let's go. Do not open fire on the maximals, only on those attacking them," 
he says, flying off toward the maximal base.
